forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 15C. E winds shifting to S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 57F. E winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
